text: int main ( ) { int t , i , n , * a , j , x ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; ++ i ) { x = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; a = ( int * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int ) * n ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; ++ j ) scanf ( "%d" , a + j ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < n - 1 ; ++ j ) { if ( * ( a + j ) < * ( a + j + 1 ) ) { while ( * ( a + j ) < * ( a + j + 1 ) ) ++ j ; ++ x ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , n + x ) ; } }
